summary: Just a little preset if anyone would like to look like my character - which is a spellsword. Glowing tattoos look fabulous but hey, you can always fiddle with a preset after you load it if you want some changes :D
descriptionHtml:
Requires:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu, obviously[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
|_(module compatible with Ningheim race)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50032/?]KJ Tattoos[/url]
|_(tattoos aren't showing in preset's mod list, so dunno what it does when the preset is imported)
SG hair pack
|_(not on Nexus, google it.. still it's THE best hair pack around, at least for female styles)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]Stoja's Warpaints[/url]
|_(eyeshadow, not really visible on screens I guess)


Items on screens:
flying light - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43609/?]Osare Culort Outfit[/url]
weapon - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36815/?]Skyforge Weapons[/url]
body straps, bra and necklace - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415/?]Brokefoot's UNP mashup[/url]
trousers, skirt, bracers, armbands, pouch, rope - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36780/?]Misfit Mage[/url]
vial holder - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/?]Bandolier[/url]
belly piercing - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1040/?]Art of Magicka[/url]
footwraps - mesh from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305/?]UNP female armors[/url] (I don't use the rest of the mod, but without this mesh, footwraps look REALLY bad with UNP body texture)

Cosmetic:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG textures[/url]



Credit goes to authors of all mods above

PS: Sorry for low quality pictures. There is only so much one can do with a laptop older than Skyrim (which was pretty average even back then). So if someone could take a glamour pick or two on a great rig with good ENB and upload a pic, I'd be really grateful :D


----- 12. 2. 2015
- added a preset with actress Rachel McAdams. No picture at this time because I've just saved the preset when she looked "just right" (well, as far as my mods allowed), like her [url=http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2014/08/04/874/n/1922398/72e18dbc93806fd8_thumb_temp_image33115181406937918/i/Best-Rachel-McAdams-Moments-Video.jpg]photo[/url] on google, then continued modifying her looks again to use as my character (aka changed hairstyle and color and added tattoos). She's a fair skinned blonde with green eyes. Looking like a nord woman should (hehe), so she's looking quite lore-friendly, except that she's still Ningheim race.
author: peregrine111
